1: <pb/><e>B'itz tu'n David</e> <pb/><t>Nman, kxel nq'o'ne chjonte teya tu'n tkyaqil wanmiye; chin jawil b'itzane kyi'j qe b'itz teya, mlay chin xob'e kywitz qe kydios xjal.</t>
2: <t>Chin b'el ·∫çmeje'ye tumlal tjaya xjan tu'n t-xi nq'o'ne chjonte ti'j tk'ujlalila ex ti'j tyola axix tok, porke o tz'ok tq'o'na mas ma' toklen tb'iya ex tyola twitz tkyaqil ti'xti.</t>
3: <t>Tej nkub'sane twitza in tzaj ttzaq'we'na, ex ok mastl wipune tu'na.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Kykyaqil qe rey te twitz tx'otx' che jawil nimsante teya ok kyb'inte aju yol tzaj ttziyana.</t>
5: <t>Kjawil kynimsa'n tb'i Qman ti'j tkyaqilju in b'ant tu'n, ex ma' tajwalil Qman.</t>
6: <t>Maske ma'xix toklen Qman, ex in che tzaj tke'yin qe xjal mans, atzun qe xjal in jaw kyniman kyib', najchaq in che tzaj tke'yin.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Qa ma chin tene tuj xob'ajil in chin klete tu'na tu'n mi'n nkyime; in tzaj tyek'una tipumala ex in chin klete tu'na ok in tzaj kytx'u'jil aj q'oj wi'je.</t>
8: <t>Kjapunel tu'n Qman aju t-ximb'etz wi'je. Nman, ktel tk'ujlalila te jumajx; mi'n kyaj tkolina aju aq'untl o tzyet tu'na.</t>
